about_the_game:
Game Description:
In a small town shrouded in mist, an ancient shrine hides the secrets of forgotten specters. You will play as a young man suffering from amnesia, gradually uncovering the hidden truths of the town. Surrounded by the eerie shrine and its enigmatic inhabitants, you will experience a chilling blend of psychological horror and puzzle-solving.

Story Background:
Mizunotsuki Town seems peaceful, but a mysterious “catastrophe” has changed everything. As a newcomer, you will interact with various female characters, discovering the secrets and dilemmas they harbor. As your investigation deepens, you’ll realize your fate is intertwined with that of this town.

Key Features:

  • Engaging Narrative: Explore the boundaries of humanity and fear in a Lovecraftian-style mystery.

  • Multiple Choices: Interact with various female characters, making different choices that lead to multiple narrative branches and endings.

  • Thoughtfully Designed Puzzles: Investigate and reason through the shrine's secrets to unravel the forgotten curse.

  • Unique Art Style: Delicate hand-drawn scenes and atmospheric music create a tense and mysterious gameplay experience.

Welcome to Mizunotsuki Town, where the truth behind the Shrine of Haunts awaits!
